description: This notification indicates that the running
configuration of the managed system has updated
the NVRAM storage of the current configuration.

event.Summary: NVRAM storage of $v2 has been updated

description: This object will return the date and time of the last
configuration save operation. This data will reflect
the last cli or the last setting of the extremeSaveConfiguration
variables.name: EXTREME-CFGMGMT-MIB::extremeLastSaveConfigTime

description: This object will return the configuration file name of the last save operation.
variables.name: EXTREME-CFGMGMT-MIB::extremeLastSaveConfigFileName

description: This object indicates the source of the last configuration save operation
for the configuration file associated with this entry, extremeLastSaveConfigFileName .
variables.name: EXTREME-CFGMGMT-MIB::extremeLastSaveConfigSource

description: This notification contain details of the last
change configuration operation for the running configure.

event.Summary: Details of the last change configuration operation of $v2

description: This object will return the date and time of the last
configuration change operation. This data will reflect
the last cli or the last setting of the extremeSaveConfiguration
variables.name: EXTREME-CFGMGMT-MIB::extremeLastChangeConfigTime

description: This object will return the configuration file name of the last change operation.
variables.name: EXTREME-CFGMGMT-MIB::extremeLastChangeConfigFileName

description: This object indicates the source of the last configuration change operation
variables.name: EXTREME-CFGMGMT-MIB::extremeLastChangeConfigSource
